interpretation:
The "singer" card represents the ability to express oneself creatively and confidently. This card suggests that you may have a talent or skill that you are ready to share with others. It also signifies the importance of finding your own unique voice and style. Whether you are a professional musician or simply enjoy singing in the shower, this card encourages you to embrace your creativity and share it with the world.

Reversed: When this card appears in reverse, it may indicate a lack of confidence or fear of expressing yourself. You may be holding back your talents or feeling insecure about your abilities. It is important to remember that everyone has their own unique style and voice, and it is never too late to start sharing your talents with the world.
